title: Rosenstein Says Probe is not a 'Fishing Expedition" (Audio)
itunes:title: Rosenstein Says Probe is not a 'Fishing Expedition" (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- William Banks, director for the Institute for National Security and Counterterrorism at Syracuse University Law School, discusses the ongoing investigation surrounding Russian involvement in the 2016 election. He speaks with Greg Stohr on Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
